p: LLC-PK1 cells (porcine kidney proximaltubular epithelial cells) (ATCC ® CL-101™) were grown in Dulbecco’s modified Eagle’s medium (DMEM, Hyclone, USA) supplemented with 10% fetal bovine serum (FBS, Gibco, Calsbad, USA) at 37 °C in a 5% CO 2 incubator. LiCl (Sigma, St. Louis, MO, USA) and DG (TargetMol, Shanghai, China) were diluted in DMEM at 1 M and 10 mg/mL, respectively, and filter-sterilized.
